lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: I know how much a dream cost , sometimes u need help to make a dream come true sometimes.
lender.occupational_info:
Founded in 2006, DynamicMixTapes.com is revolutionizing online urban marketing, connecting local, national and international users to all facets of the music industry. DynamicMixTapes.com sales mixtape DVD and CDs not often available from the larger chains: FYE, Sam Goody, Virgin Records, Circuit city, Wal-Mart this is just to name a few. DynamicMixTapes.com improved the always thriving mixtape industry and filled a niche that both artists and consumers alike were searching for, by marketing for these types of MixTape DVD/CDs, as evidenced by the general demographics (Urban life and the new demand on line for urban music) and the popularity of the latest DJs.
Twenty five years ago, it was popular among young adults to create mix cassette tapes of their favorite music for personal use and as gifts for friends. Today, with the wide distribution of CD recording equipment, Internet technology, and new recording formats like MP3, DJ now have the ability to create personalized presentations of their favorite music. The market for MixTapes has exploded as a consequence of DJs' ability to create quality MixTapes DVD/CD. With the average price for a new MixTape DVD is $15-$20 and CD at $5-$10, young adults would rather buy from DynamicMixTapes.com for a little over half that price: a MixTape DVD for $10 and CD at $5.
This market has been ignored by the dominant stores with in the internet. They may have a few MixTape DVD/CDs that fit these descriptions, but in general they are far and few between. It is too difficult for the large corporations to market to this specific segment, particularly with their current business model which is putting a stores in all cities that are very similar in feel and library with a concentration on large scale commercial releases.
Through the use of DynamicMixTapes.com competitive advantage attention to customers, DynamicMixTapes.com will grow steadily to profitability. This is manifested in two ways, 1) providing outstanding customer service and knowledgeable help, and 2) supplying MixTapes DVD/CD that have a demand on line but the demand has yet to be addressed by the other players who leave it off their radar, assuming it is only for the fringe of the general population. Fortunately, we have MySpace and other great web sites to help market on line general population.

lender.name: St. Mary's Econ
lender.loan_because: We became aware of the program through our studies of microfinancing. We thought that this project would give us a hands experience with the process of microfinancing. We also felt that our donations would positively impact entrepreneurs in across the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are students at St. Mary's School in Memphis, Tn. We raise money through several fundraisers, including selling bottled water and collecting donations from the rest of the student body.

lender.occupational_info: One of us works to facilitate healing in others. The other builds houses and retrofits some for those with physical disabilities.

lender.loan_because: Feels Good to help another people that need the money more then me.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: This is one of the easiest ways to help lift people out of poverty, and it's self sustaining.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects dealing with new power plants all over the world.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to help people realize their dream.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Honest, hardworking people deserve a chance. We're all responsible for helping to give them that chance.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: We live together on a rather small planet, and that makes us all neighbours. I can make an important difference to someone somewhere. And I can keep re-lending the same money!
lender.occupational_info: I take phone calls all day, and research answers for people using a computer database.

lender.name: Shelisa
lender.loan_because: of my mother, grandmothers, mother in law, and son.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Community Capacity & Development Specialist. I work with communities to develop sustainable, local systems of healthcare for low-income, uninsured & underserved people living in Eastern North Carolina.

lender.name: Yosef
lender.occupational_info: In the United States, like in many countries around the world, telephone bills often contain errors. I examine business telephone bills and, if I find any errors, I contact the telephone company to obtain a refund for my client.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to start your own business. I am so happy that I can help!
lender.occupational_info: I work in public relations, which means that I try to ensure that the media in the U.S. writes and talks about the companies and products I represent in a positive way.

lender.name: MultiFunding
lender.loan_because: We understand the importance of access to capital. We work everyday with small business owners and entrepreneurs to secure financing. Our success should benefit our families, but also those who live in a place where funding is not so plentiful. Each time we help a client secure financing, we will make a microloan to an entrepreneur through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: We educate small business owners about debt financing options and then work with them to secure the best product for their business.

lender.name: Ron & Michelle
lender.loan_because: We have a wonderful life in Canada where our business has helped us achieve our goals. We want to help others in the world with achieve theirs.

lender.name: Steph + Brian
lender.loan_because: It is a simple way to make an impact.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: everyone should have opportunities to be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a not for profit organisation that helps urban aboriginal people with employment and training opportunities.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing my blessings when I can!
lender.occupational_info: I manage medical research projects that primary care doctors conduct which in turn in provides better medical care for people in my community in the future

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help others. It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work in pricing at an electric utility. I love international travel and it reminds me how fortunate I am just to be born in the U.S.

lender.name: Smedley's Class
lender.loan_because: Throughout the two years of being together, Ms Gail Smedley's Aiming High class has grown together as a family. From the beginning of 7th grade, we have learned how fortunate we are to live in relative peace and prosperity and how we are members of a global community. Our class has decided to share some of our blessings by helping aspiring entrepreneurs build a better life for themselves. The 2007-2008 8th grade class is the beginning of a great legacy, which will continue in future years, donating to Kiva with each new 8th grade class.
lender.occupational_info: Ms Smedley teaches a group of hardworking, dedicated students that have been accepted into the Highly Capable Program for Gifted Learners in Ferndale, WA. We spend half a day together for two years in middle school covering the subjects of Language Arts, Social Studies, and Literature. More importantly, as a result of many deep philosophical discussions, we learn about ourselves and our responsibilities as global citizens.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: I have a good life and want to give others a chance at a good life.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze the performance of large computers systems used by banks, stock exchanges, retails and other corporations. These critical systems are used for such things as processing financial transactions.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Sharing is caring!
lender.occupational_info: I teach history and sociology at the High School level, and I love my job!!!

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to have been born in the west and have the opportunities I have for only that reason. Other should not be held back becasue of where they are born and live.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I can and because if I were in the same situation, I'd hope someone would do the same.

lender.name: Bellarmine Chapel
lender.loan_because: We are called to help those less fortunate than ourselves. Kiva allows us to use our resources over and over to help others and to extend our reach to the global community.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Jesuit parish in the Archdiocese of Cincinnati with a strong commitment to social action.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It is always good to help others. Doing so helps the world become a better place. We can all help out in small ways, through lending money or through lending a helping hand.

lender.name: Steve & Olivia
lender.loan_because: We had read about microfinancing and thought it was absolutely vital.
lender.occupational_info: I program computers, mostly for internet sites.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: helping people to help themselves benefits us all.
lender.occupational_info: I'm Chief Financial Officer of a private investment company.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: My friends and I had the idea to make loans in honor of our friendship a few years back for Christmas presents - now I get to continue re-lending and it's so fun!

lender.name: Harriet
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the opportunity to live their dreams and by helping others to grow I too may grow, and that from it we all may prosper.
lender.occupational_info: As a massage therapist, I work to ease muscular tension, increase flexibility, improve circulation and overall health of a person. Whether for maintenance, relaxation and stress relief, rehab, pre - or post- sports, or general care...I believe massage to be an integral part of wellness for a person's body, mind, and spirit.

lender.name: Andy's Mom
lender.loan_because: We must start doing things to impact the world at large. Helping our brothers and sisters with the things were are so blessed to receive and take for granted - - freedom from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help counsel children in an area which is poverty stricken and resources are scarce. Being a counselor is my calling in life.

lender.name: Christopher & Andrea
lender.loan_because: it is very important to help individuals who are trying to create a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that repairs and installs many different types of power generating equipment throughout the world. My wife works for a company that makes medicine.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student, studying Spanish at University

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I like to help others and their small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a small convenience store at a senior retirement community.

lender.name: Fabio Cunha
lender.whereabouts: Sao Bernardo do Campo Sao Paulo
lender.loan_because: I believe

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I recently retired after teaching Spanish for 37 years.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Technology Support Services

lender.name: PIA M
lender.loan_because: I want people to succeed. Kiva.org gives me the opportunity to connect with the rest of the world that I would not otherwise have on my own.
lender.occupational_info: I am a financial planner; interested in issues affecting our global community.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: Why not? It's a simple thing to do to help others as I have been helped in my own life.

lender.name: Celine
lender.loan_because: governments profiting, it's just very rewarding to see that your small contribution can help someone achieve their goal, grow their business, support their family...

lender.name: julia
lender.occupation: former business owner-now advocate for refugees

lender.name: Leeta
lender.loan_because: I like to see the results of my lending.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom who keeps busy with my daughter.

lender.name: LSNHS Broncos
lender.loan_because: To give back to others around the world in need and teach young people about other cultures.
lender.occupational_info: We are a collection of high school students in Kansas City and their teacher.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupation: M.B.A and M.A SID, Brandeis University
lender.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of people. I believe that people should have an opportunity to follow their dreams.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women in Africa to be independent and to provide for their children.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I do what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lender.name: Marla
lender.loan_because: I can..
lender.occupational_info: Moving Image Research: educational help for researchers, studios, art organizations, everybody, etc.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired

lender.name: Randall
lender.loan_because: success needs a starting point
lender.occupational_info: I sell coffee and coffee related retail items.

lender.name: Carolee
lender.loan_because: I feel my money is well-spent when it goes to people who is trying hard to help themselves. Those who are ambitious and striving for success need the help of those of us who are already blessed with success.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have retired from our professions, but we own a fine art gallery where we sell beautiful works of art from all over the world. I also help others stay healthy by selling the best natural vitamin supplements and environmentally safe cleaning products available.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a contract testing laboratory that does analytical and microbiological testing for drug products, home products, personal care products, and food among other things.

lender.name: Amy P
lender.loan_because: it's a great opportunity to share and connect and celebrate the abundance of life. I read about Kiva in Bill Clinton's book. I know a small amount of money can make a big difference to someone in another country.
lender.occupational_info: My work is fast-paced and detail oriented. It gives me flexibility to do interesting things in my free time. I've been to India several times and love the people there.

lender.name: Gudlaug
lender.loan_because: I believe people should be allowed to have their dignity by helping them to be selfsufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Small amount of money from me can make such a BIG difference in other peoples lifes.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: I love simple things, KIVA is one of them. They make it possible for me to make a small contribution for others to change there life's by starting there own business.
lender.occupational_info: my succes is based on three words: work , work, work the reward is not just the money but also the joy, the exitement, the result when it is finisched and above all it give me Freedom

lender.name: Sheree
lender.loan_because: I know that I am connected to everyone on this planet and from my joy of giving I am able to create the joy of receiving, accomplishing and prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: Embracing and discovering the dynamic evolution of the world spirit inside the beauty that is in every one of us.

lender.name: Mohamed
lender.loan_because: other babies need my help.
lender.occupational_info: I cry and eat :)

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: I would like to try to make a difference in someone's life and I have the ability to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I have a Notice-to-Owner service for sub-trades in the construction industry.

lender.name: Wyatt
lender.loan_because: i believe in redemption, and I believe it can show up anywhere
lender.occupational_info: I sell a service that makes it easier for non profit groups to raise funds for their projects they do.

lender.name: Ledge Class of 2007
lender.loan_because: We can, and we want to. We came across Kiva as one of the final projects to take leadership in contributing towards a better world.
lender.occupational_info: Students of Leadership & Management at Curtin University, Perth, Western Australia

lender.name: carmen
lender.loan_because: Becasuse, I want to stablish a store in my address.
lender.occupational_info: Help to others, lend services in my comunity.

lender.name: Ulrich Family
lender.loan_because: Everyone can make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all the help I have received. It is my wish for everyone everywhere to feel safe, have enough to eat, and be warm.
lender.occupational_info: I give treatment and medicine to people who are sick or hurt, and work to prevent illness and injury.

lender.name: Judi
lender.loan_because: I am incredibly blessed and want to help people accomplish their dreams!

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I have tremendous respect for the entrepreneurs who have not only a good idea, but the determination to turn it into a successful venture.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a doctor.

lender.name: Cow Watchers
lender.loan_because: we're good human beings.

lender.name: World History Class
lender.loan_because: We want to help people better their lives.

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed
lender.occupational_info: teaching

lender.name: Jennie
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometimes and I think that this is a great way to lend a hand to a stranger. I also like that I can know more about where my money is going - I can see the person and learn about how our money is being used. I also like that I can give money and get it back to give to someone else, so with a small investment on my part I can reach out to lots of people.
lender.occupational_info: I live in Colorado (and I love it) but I am originally from Mississippi. In my work I try to keep children healthy.

lender.name: William
lender.occupational_info: I write childrens books about sailing.

lender.name: ASL4U
lender.occupational_info: I help people who speak different languages communicate with each other.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Being able to make a small loan with a group of other people feels great. What an incredible concept Kiva is!
lender.occupational_info: I work in hospital in a small city in Connecticut. I perform laboratory tests and specialize in Hematology.

lender.name: Phymean
lender.loan_because: I want to help and make a difference. It's a small amount but you can change someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping children and women in my country (Cambodia), If I can I want to help other countries too.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: pamela
lender.loan_because: I believe if you are blessed with a good life, you should do whatever is possible to help others in achieving their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a banker since 1990. I assist my customers with loans and investments to help them with their financial goals.

lender.name: ExtraGravy
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.

lender.name: RJD Solutions Inc.
lender.loan_because: at RJD Solutions our mission statement is 'A Solution For Everyone.' We interpret our mission statement in the most holistic of manners. We pride ourselves in providing solutions for not just our clients but our global community at large. We believe that financial obstacles should not come in the way of one reaching their entrepreneural goals and as a result support Kiva's efforts to foster entrepreneural endeavors worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: We are a multifaceted corporation that provides a wide spectrum of legal and real estate services. We consider ourselves a 'one-stop shop' where clients can come to have a wide spectrum of services provided for them at affordable rates and receive professional work that surpasses industry standards.

lender.name: Manish
lender.loan_because: it can make a huge difference in someone else's life .It's great to have the opportunity to support people working hard for a better life.

lender.name: Leelja
lender.loan_because: I can do it and I love pioneering. Such a beautiful way to network.
lender.occupational_info: I offer you peace. I offer you love. I offer you friendship. I see your beauty. I hear your need. I feel your feelings. My wisdom flows from the Highest Source. I salute that Source in you. Let us work together for unity and love. Mahatma Gandhi's Prayer For Peace

lender.name: Jomy
lender.loan_because: There is no greater joy than helping people

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I heard Bill Clinton speak and he motivated me to get involved.

lender.name: Mara
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way for me to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help students return to school to get their college degree.

lender.name: Muriel
lender.loan_because: It feels like such a worthwhile thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites that help people to sell their products to others.

lender.name: andrew
lender.loan_because: I can and I should
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in South Korea and study pottery

lender.name: omniartist
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do, to help someone get to a better place by working for the future.
lender.occupational_info: I help make products which provide little value to every days lives, but they help pay the bills

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Allocco Family
lender.loan_because: we want to share
lender.occupational_info: Jimmy started his own business - he owns a hardwood flooring installation and refinishing company; Tina works in a university based allergy clinic as a Nurse Practitioner

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to make a positive difference in the world we live in.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a hospital administrator.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: A little to me is alot to someone else.

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: I see this as a great opportunity to help those in need. It is better than charity because it empowers those who are usually marginalized.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in economic analysis to help evaluate the future residual values of cars and trucks for lease purposes.

lender.name: Saylor
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: aide worker, teacher, EMT - student, marketing manager

lender.name: Steve Silver
lender.loan_because: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful citizens can change the world." - Margaret Mead
lender.occupational_info: www.silveradomedia.com

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I believe we are really our brothers keeper. My helping them help themselves , we are being family.

lender.name: Autumn
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to be an entrepreneur, and I'm in awe of people with so much less who are accomplishing so much more. I am living vicariously through their ambition and success. :)

lender.name: scott
lender.occupational_info: digital archives

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for this opportunity to help others because I have had so many friends help me.
lender.occupational_info: People pay me to do what they don't have time to do.

lender.name: Darryn
lender.occupation: i am the Yahoo Intl Inc cordinator for lottery 07

lender.name: Stig
lender.loan_because: People alle over the world should be giving a chance to make a better life for themselver no matter their background.
lender.occupational_info: Developing IT systems

lender.name: Fredrick
lender.loan_because: I believe nothing comes easy and that the sky is not the only limit. Having grown up in the third world, I know what it means to help those in need. Help people so that they can help themselves and many others around them.

lender.name: Najam un Nisa
lender.loan_because: If you dont lend a hand then those in need can never stand up on their own feet. This is how it should be! We should help each other out without hurting anyone's pride and dignity in the process. I am so proud of people who like my mother fight for a better life and try to change their living situation. Good job everyone and GOOD LUCK:-)
lender.occupational_info: I work in museum of fine arts as a security worker. I can also answer people's questions about art and artists since I have studied art history. There are many very famous painters and sculptors in my gallery, for example, Munch, Piccasso, Van Gogh, Monet, Rodin and many Norwegian painters. I like it very much especially when children are seeing and learning about art for the first time. I love the sparkle in their eyes:-)

lender.name: Lucil
lender.loan_because: I believe true wealth is measured by the ability to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Kai
lender.loan_because: Personal engagement, and I belive in the idea of microloan.

lender.name: Kiva Funds - Dual Hank
lender.loan_because: I've got enough for my family and myself. Other people need this money more than I do...

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: It will hopefully help people create a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Mie
lender.loan_because: I would like other people to have a greater life

lender.name: Espen
lender.loan_because: Muhammad Yunus and his Grameen Bank won the Nobel Peace Price in 2006. Kiva makes me able to participate in the concept of microcredit.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer systems

lender.name: Dagfinn A
lender.loan_because:
This world is grossly unfair to all too many people AND I believe in doing something myself and not ask for society and everybody else to take responsibility . . . besides; I think they make better use of this money than me.
If you would join the team Supporters of Ukraine or Supporters of Moldova and also learn more about these people I can promise it will change you - tusen takk.
lender.occupational_info:
Hectic and never finished - mainly sales and project management/development. NOW with a dream to visit some of those who put our money into good use.
Enjoy yourself and have a rest looking at this fabolous works at http://DudyginaART.com

lender.loan_because: laanekassen provide with more than enough for myself
lender.occupational_info: eat, sleep, kiss and tell

lender.loan_because: I want to help people that wants to be able to provide for them selves
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that is responsible for IT-solutions in norwegian hospitals

lender.occupational_info: I play violin and write songs for a living.

lender.name: Magnus
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: A small contribution can make a big difference! And I`m happy for the opportunity to contribute.
lender.occupational_info: I work in sales in a Scandinavian based company.

lender.name: Oyvind Berger
lender.loan_because: I loan because i can....and will ! No religion or politics involved, just helping..

lender.name: John-Arne
lender.loan_because: I lend money because this allows the hard work of the entrepreneur to give better income and a better life. This is my small personal contribution to make the world a better place for everyone.

lender.name: Tormod
lender.loan_because: I think it is appropriate to provide self-help where people live. Money given as loan and ,not as a gift establishes an ownership of their own businesses.

lender.name: Wilhelmine
lender.loan_because: I can make a differense!
lender.occupational_info: I design and produce jewellery.

lender.name: Caspar
lender.loan_because: it is our duty to give from our abundance to those that have little!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It's helpful.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English.

lender.name: Heidi Rønne
lender.loan_because: We all should give microloans, because most of us can afford to. By helping one woman, you actually give aid to 5 people, her entire family in many cases. By fighting poverty, we also fight terrorism.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Account Manager at Adecco Norway.

lender.name: Mette
lender.loan_because: It was my birthday present from my husband! I really like the idea.

lender.name: Familien Hesselberg
lender.loan_because: God has given us everything we need in life. God gave us each other, a beautiful son, jobs, a house to live in and a lot more. God is our provider. We've been blessed so much, so we would like to contribute to that other people will be blessed. :)

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Handling the ICT solutions in our municipality. New position as of January 2011.

lender.name: Kristian
lender.loan_because: Not all can be super rich, but everyone has the right to buy their food every day.

lender.name: Chris @ Yado.com
lender.loan_because: Quote a friend of mine " believe that loans are better than blind donations to corrupt governments. Loans make people work harder, and it gives them an objective..."
lender.occupational_info: Work with different areas of computers

lender.name: Yoshi the Jap Spitz
lender.loan_because: Voff voff voff voff, vooff voff voff voooff!
lender.occupational_info: Vooff voff, voff.

lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way of giving aid - to stimulate people to make their own income.

lender.name: Dag

lender.loan_because: Thinking a mere $25.00 can change the lives of others, What a great way to spend it !
lender.occupational_info: Helping people help themselves.

lender.loan_because: We believe it's a good way to help people in need, and it's nice to know who get's the money and monitor how their business develope.

lender.name: Idar

lender.name: Joachim
lender.loan_because: Don´t need the money, so why not lend it to sombody who does.

lender.name: Monica Høgseth
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. A great opportunity to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Stian
lender.loan_because: Everybody should have the possibility to loan money to invest in what they believe in. This is especially true when it may help people get out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I manage sales and budgeting, and look for ways to do business efficiently.

lender.name: Gorm
lender.loan_because: I think the money will be invested better by the loaners on Kiva than my bank

lender.name: Helena

lender.occupational_info: I´m a student, hoping to become a medical secretary.

lender.loan_because: I have the funds, I have a Kiva account and a lot of people around the world need loans to improve their situation. (How did I do?)

lender.name: Kathinka
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to making life better for people in need around the world.

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with people who have believed in me...I think it is important to pass on that kindness and effort.
lender.occupational_info: I help make pharmaceuticals that are used in hospitals around the world.

lender.name: Allis & Marchus
lender.loan_because: It's the least we could do :)

lender.name: Helle
lender.loan_because: I want to help as many as possible, its crazy how different our lives are. My father asked me what I wish for x-mas, and I really don't need anything, and its even hard to find something to wish for. I will rather give away money to someone who really needs it. I found this site very uplifting.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Telecom, cellphones and fixed phones, solutions for business market in Norway. Not really so much to say about it, but I like it :o)

lender.name: Sigurd
lender.loan_because: I try to leave as much of the money i spend when i travel as possible at local businesses, and it's nice to be able to contribute to small businesses in developing nations from home as well.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I have everything I could possibly need in life and I would like to help people who are not as fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I assist sales representatives in the Oil & Gas department of the company, working mostly within the project database and in the area of reporting.

lender.name: Hekla
lender.loan_because: I care and want to make a difference, if only a micro one ;-) The world is already smaller...

lender.name: Jac
lender.loan_because: Have enough, others don't
lender.occupational_info: If I do my job properly, nobody will ever see I''ve been there
